Instructions.Value:
You incline your head toward [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]]. "If anyone could pull off what you're suggesting, it's you, but let's not test that theory."

{TGT_MW.DET_C} smile falters. "This gear is going to rust in that dingy warehouse."

"You're probably right, MechWarrior. But you've got a gift. I've seen you make fifty tons of steel dance. That kind of talent isn't worth risking on some spare parts."

{TGT_MW.Callsign} swells with pride. "Damn right. Well, if you change your mind, you know who to ask. I'll find a way to 'procure' whatever you need." {TGT_MW.SUBJ_C} {TGT_MW.Gender?NonBinary:wink|Default:winks} knowingly.
